articles.title: The Bad Guys Takes Down Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore to Win the Weekend Domestic Box Office - IGN - IGN
articles.description: The Bad Guys has passed Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore to win the domestic weekend box office with ticket sales of $24 million.
articles.content:
The Bad Guys has passed Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore to win the domestic weekend box office with ticket sales of $24 million.

articles.author: Melanie McFarland
articles.title: "The Man Who Fell to Earth" ambitiously picks up where the sci-fi cult classic's mission ended - Salon
articles.description: Chiwetel Ejiofor and Naomie Harris are crack co-pilots in this continuation of the tale immortalized by David Bowie

articles.author: Zoe Sottile, CNN
articles.title: A dress worn by Judy Garland in 'The Wizard of Oz' is up for sale - CNN
articles.description: You might not have to go all that far for your dream dress -- certainly not "somewhere over the rainbow."
